price: On kažnjava onog koga On hoće i milost ukazuje onom kome On hoće, i Njemu ćete se vratiti.
arabic: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُقۡلَبُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yuʿadhibu man yashāu wayarḥamu man yashāu wa-ilayhi tuq'labūna
